name: 蕭名宏
objective: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹各種不同分析方法（如能量法及Castigliano定理）、破壞理論、材料選用、可靠度概念、軸及軸承、離合器及煞車器、傳動元件(如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪)、軸聯接器、飛輪、彈簧等。
schedule:
1. 機械設計概論
2. 破壞理論
3. 元件設計與選用
    a. Shafts and shaft components
    b. Screws, fasteners, and the Design of non-permanent joints
    c. Welding, bonding, and the design of permanent joints
    d. Mechanical spring
    e. bearings
    f. gears
    g. Flexible Mechanical elements
scorePolicy: 上課表現10%，平時考佔20%，期中考佔30%，期末考40%
materials:
Shigley‘s Mechanical Engineering Design (10th edition) international edition 2015 by Budynas & Nisbett (中譯本9th)
